original_text: Again he began to teach beside the sea. And a very large crowd gathered about him, so that he got into a boat and sat in it on the sea, and the whole crowd was beside the sea on the land.
korean_text: 예수께서 다시 바닷가에서 가르치시니 큰 무리가 모여들거늘 예수께서 바다에 떠 있는 배에 올라 앉으시고 온 무리는 바닷가 육지에 있더라

sentences.original_text: Again he began to teach beside the sea.
And a very large crowd gathered about him,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아주 큰 무리가 그에게 모였다,

sentences.original_text: so that he got into a boat
and sat in it on the sea,
and the whole crowd was beside the sea on the land.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 온 무리는 땅에 있는 바닷가에 있었다.
